title: The Lakers, Sean McVay, The Patriots and Kevin Durant
itunes:title: The Lakers, Sean McVay, The Patriots and Kevin Durant
description:
Colin says that the Lakers need to plug the leaks because it makes everyone look bad. Colin defends Los Angeles Rams head coach Sean McVay for praising Bill Belichick when they met before the Super Bowl. Colin says that of the three current dynasties, the Patriots are the team that will outlast the Warriors and Alabama. Colin explains how there are two versions of LeBron and the second version of Lebron is not committed to the Lakers. Plus, Colin thinks Kevin Durant going to the Knicks is reckless mobility..

Guests include: Nick Wright, Don Yee, Chris Broussard and Greg Cosell

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
